channel.title: MolPhys I on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn
channel.description: Recent content in MolPhys I on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn

item.title: MolPhys I
item.description: Molecular Physics I - MolPhys I Course Molecular Physics I Course No. MolPhys I Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 3+1 6 WT Requirements: Preparation: Atomic Physics, Molecular Physics and Quantum Mechanics at the level of the bachelor courses in physics Form of Testing and Examination: Oral Examination Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: In the first part of the core courses the students learn the main concepts of molecular physics: separation of electronic, vibrational and rotational motion.
